description_html: Amba Products is excited to offer a new and unique design to our popular Jeeves Collection — The Model A “Ladder Style” heated towel rack, and now available in the hottest finish of the season: Matte Black. This stylish rack compliments any interior by upgrading the standard and impractical towel bar to a warm hanging space, bringing the luxury and decor of a high-end hotel to your bathroom!
product_name: Amba Products Heated Towel Rack — Jeeves Collection New Model A "Ladder" now in Matte Black
